## IEngineConfig.minHandPresenceProbabilityThreshold property

If the classifiers probability of a hand being present falls below this threshold the engine will use the box model to look out for a hand. Default is `0.5`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minHandPresenceProbabilityThreshold?: number;
```
